channel.title: How do I change the xp, for skills
channel.description:
I want to make the skills harder to get up so you don't get to level 126 in an hour or level 99 for crafting in 5 mins. I would like the skills to be harder to get up but I have no-idea how to do this. Help would be nice thanks.
Mankk

item.title: How do I change the xp, for skills
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

goto item.cfg and say if too_kit 1 1 1 menas sells buys alch i dont know what order they go in.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change the xp, for skills

item.title: How do I change the xp, for skills
item.dc:creator: @mankk mankk
item.description:
@mankk wrote:

Oh ok thankyou very much!

Mankk[br][size=1]Posted on: July 02, 2007, 06:02:10 AM[/size][hr]I know this is a bit off topic, however do you also know please how I would set prices for items in the shops. Or are the default? Thankyou.

Mankk

item.source: How do I change the xp, for skills

item.title: How do I change the xp, for skills
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go into client.java heres an what to do:

say if crafting gave 1000 xp i would look for addSkillXP(1000, 12); or addSkillXP((1000*playerLevel[12]), 12); just used this to change the xp rate

Read full topic
